page.title: 04A GLOSSOPDALE MOTHER
page.content: The day usually{starts }at {7am. } When dressed the children make their lunches whilst I make breakfast.Sarah, 15, and Nicholas,13, take the train to school, St Philip Howard in{Glossop: Daniel,11, and Timothy,7, go to St. Charles' in{Hadfield.}After taking Tim to {school}I visit the{local bakery and {greengrocers. Returning home I do some {housework} and {sewing}before reading the newspaper whilst having lunch. In the{ {afternoon}I accompany Daniel's class to the{swimming pool.}At 4pm I{prepare {a meal}while the children do homework or practise their music. After dinner I attend a{yoga class;} Sarah has orchestra practice and the rest go to play or watch cricket. I usually {collect}Sarah from Glossop and return home to watch TV, knit, or read{before going to bed about 12pm.
